price: 36. Mas solo encontramos un hogarcuyos miembros se habían sometido a Al-lah (la familia de Lot, con la excepción de su esposa).
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
